title: Ambassador-designate to Romania calls on DPM/FM Dar
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 18 (APP): Ambassador-designate of Pakistan to Romania Ilyas Mehmood Nizami, Saturday, paid a courtesy call on Deputy Prime Minister/Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar.
The DPM/FM appreciated Nizami’s valuable contributions as DG (South Asia) at the ministry, particularly during critical times, Foreign Office Spokesperson said in a press release.
He wished him success in his new assignment and encouraged efforts to further deepen and widen Pakistan–Romania relations.
